titleStmt.title: An excellent sonnet of the unfortunate loves of Hero and Leander To the tune of, Gerhard's mistress, &c.
titleStmt.author: Crouch, Humphrey, fl. 1635-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by and for W[illiam]. O[nley]. and sold by the booksellers,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication and publisher's name from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Verse - "How fares my dear Leander? O vouchsafe to speak,".
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
Identified by ESTC as Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) C7278A.
